title: Tal Ben-Shahar: "Happiness Studies"
description: Cofounder of Happiness Studies Academy Tal Ben-Shahar with Michael on his new book "Happiness Studies: An Introduction." Originally aired 3 September 2021. Book published on 5 July 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tel Ben Shahar, Michael Smerconish)
